desc: Ritchie Feed and Seed Inc. is one of Ottawa’s oldest garden centre’s serving Ottawa for 95 years. We offer a wide variety of indoor gardening products such as, houseplants, tropicals, cactus and succulent. Ritchie’s has Ottawa’s largest selection of garden seeds annuals, perennials, trees and shrubs.

layout.text: WANT TO CONTROL THE ALGAE IN YOUR POND?
